data.title: Lewis Nkosi
data.meta_description: Lewis Nkosi. Writer: Come back Africa. Lewis Nkosi was born on 5 December 1926 in Durban, South Africa. He was a writer, known for Come back Africa (1959), Have You Seen Drum Recently? (1989) and In Darkest Hollywood: Cinema and Apartheid (1993). He died on 5 September 2010 in Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa.
data.text: Lewis Nkosi was born on December 5, 1926 in Durban, South Africa. He was a writer, known for Come back Africa (1959), Have You Seen Drum Recently? (1989) and In Darkest Hollywood: Cinema and Apartheid (1993). He died on September 5, 2010 in Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa.
